# Weak

ore borax
type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/borax
lang.en Borax

ore cinnabar oreCinnabar
type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/cinnabar
lang.en Cinnabar (Mercury Ore)

ore galena oreLead
type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/galena
lang.en Galena (Lead Ore)

# This was referred to oreMolydenum in the original PFAA COG XML
ore molybdenite oreMolybdenum
type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/molybdenite
lang.en Molybdenite (Molybdenum Ore)

type stone
hardness 2.0

lang.en Pyrolusite (Manganese Ore)

lang.en Trona

ore bog_iron oreIron
type stone
hardness 2.0
convertsTo minecraft:iron_ore
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/bog_iron
lang.en Bog Iron

# Medium

hardness 3.0

lang.en Barite (Barium Ore)

type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/bastnasite
lang.en Bastnasite

hardness 3.0

# Regardless of IUPAC naming, oreBauxite came first
ore alunite oreBauxite
type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/alunite
lang.en Alunite (Aluminium Ore)

ore celestine oreStrontium
type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/celestine
lang.en Celestine (Strontium Ore)

type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/dolomite
lang.en Dolomite (Magnesium Ore)

ore fluorite
type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/fluorite
lang.en Fluorite

ore wollastonite
type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/wollastonite
lang.en Wollastonite

ore zeolite
type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/zeolite
lang.en Zeolite

# Strong

type stone
hardness 4.0
convertsTo minecraft:iron_ore
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/banded_iron
textureCaps strata:blocks/ore/strong/banded_iron_caps
lang.en Banded Iron (Iron Ore)

hardness 4.0

hardness 4.0

texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/magnetite
lang.en Magnetite (Iron Ore)

# Caesium is the IUPAC name. Beware of oreCesium
ore pollucite oreCaesium
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/pollucite
lang.en Pollucite (Caesium Ore)

ore spodumene oreLithium
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/spodumene
lang.en Spodumene (Lithium Ore)

ore tantalite oreTantalum
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/tantalite
lang.en Tantalite (Tantalum Ore)

ore pitchblende oreUranium
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/pitchblende
lang.en Pitchblende (Uranium Ore)

ore vanadium_magnetite oreVanadium
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/vanadium_magnetite
lang.en Vanadium Magnetite (Vanadium Ore)

# orePhosphate or orePhosphorus? PFAA COG XML uses oreApatite

hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/apatite
lang.en Apatite

hardness 4.0

# Crude

ore oil_shale
type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/crude/oil_shale
lang.en Oil Shale

ore bituminous_coal oreCoal bituminousCoal
type stone
hardness 3.0
convertsTo minecraft:coal_ore
burnTime 1600
texture strata:blocks/ore/crude/bituminous_coal
lang.en Bituminous Coal

type stone
hardness 3.0
convertsTo minecraft:coal_ore
burnTime 1600
texture strata:blocks/ore/crude/lignite
lang.en Lignite

type stone
hardness 3.0
convertsTo minecraft:coal_ore
burnTime 1600
texture strata:blocks/ore/crude/anthracite
lang.en Anthracite

texture strata:blocks/ore/crude/coke
lang.en Coke

# Clay

ore bauxite oreBauxite
type clay
hardness 1.5
texture strata:blocks/ore/clay/bauxite
lang.en Bauxite (Aluminium Ore)

ore brown_limonite oreIron
type clay
hardness 1.5
convertsTo minecraft:iron_ore
texture strata:blocks/ore/clay/brown_limonite
lang.en Brown Limonite (Iron Ore)

ore yellow_limonite oreIron
type clay
hardness 1.5
convertsTo minecraft:iron_ore
texture strata:blocks/ore/clay/yellow_limonite
lang.en Yellow Limonite (Iron Ore)
